for _ in range(0, int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    v = list(map(int, input().split()))
    o = 0
    o = sum((x % 2 for x in v))
    e = n - o
    if o % 2 == 0 and e % 2 == 0:
        print('YES')
        continue
    if o % 2 == 1 and e % 2 == 1:
        s = sorted(v)
        print(['NO', 'YES'][any((s[w] - 1 == s[w - 1] for w in range(1, n)))])
        continue
    print('NO')

for l in [*open(0)][2::2]:
    b = c = 0
    p = -1
    for i in sorted(map(int, l.split())):
        b += i - p == 1
        c += i % 2
        p = i
    print('NYOE S'[b > 0 or not c % 2::2])

for l in [*open(0)][2::2]:
    b = c = 0
    p = -1
    for i in sorted(map(int, l.split())):
        b += i - p == 1
        c += i % 2
        p = i
    print('NYOE S'[b > 0 or not c % 2::2])

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    lst = list(map(int, input().split()))
    lst.sort()
    even = 0
    odd = 0
    cond = False
    diff = float('inf')
    i = 0
    cnt = 0
    while i < n:
        if i < n - 1 and abs(lst[i] - lst[i + 1]) == 1:
            even += 1
            odd += 1
            cnt += 1
            i += 2
        elif lst[i] % 2 == 0:
            even += 1
            i += 1
        else:
            odd += 1
            i += 1
    if even % 2 == 0 and odd % 2 == 0:
        print('YES')
    elif even % 2 != 0 and odd % 2 != 0 and (cnt >= 1):
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')
